page.title: 07EMERGENCY SERVICES(HEALTH)
page.content: {Hinchingbrooke hospital}was built in 1977 beacause the smaller Huntingdon County hospital could not cope with the demand.When built it cost about {Â£10 million. Here are some statistics showing the amount of people it handles. Yearly number of: Inpatients -{8691}(725 monthly) Accidents Cases -{18721}(1560 monthly) Day Cases -{1665}(139 monthly) Outpatients -{43}(4 per month) Births -{1496}(125 per month) { }Staff employed{892.}The cost of runnning the hospital is about{Â£6.6 {millon}per annum. It has the best equipped{maternity unit in the country.
